com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.business.service

Interface PetService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PetServiceImpl

    public PetService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <E> PetProxy findPetByEntity(E entity)
      Tries to find the pet from the given entity. Returns null if the pet does not exist.
      <P> java.util.Optional<com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.business.proxy.PetProxy> getOrSpawnPetFromPlayer(P player)
      Gets or spawns the pet of the given player. An empty optional gets returned if the pet cannot spawn by one of the following reasons: Current world, region is disabled for pets, PreSpawnEvent was cancelled or Pet is not available due to Ai State. For example HealthAI defines pet ai as 0 which results into impossibility to spawn.
      <P> boolean hasPet(P player)
      Gets if the given player has got an active pet.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrSpawnPetFromPlayer

        <P> java.util.Optional<com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.business.proxy.PetProxy> getOrSpawnPetFromPlayer(P player)

        Gets or spawns the pet of the given player. An empty optional gets returned if the pet cannot spawn by one of the following reasons: Current world, region is disabled for pets, PreSpawnEvent was cancelled or Pet is not available due to Ai State. For example HealthAI defines pet ai as 0 which results into impossibility to spawn.

      • findPetByEntity

        <E> PetProxy findPetByEntity(E entity)

        Tries to find the pet from the given entity. Returns null if the pet does not exist.

      • hasPet

        <P> boolean hasPet(P player)

        Gets if the given player has got an active pet.
